apiDoc.name: FollowButtonPill
apiDoc.description: A pill-shaped follow button with smooth hover animations and compact mode. Supports following both users and hashtags with icon display, target name display, and expandable compact mode that shows full content on hover. Features solid and outline variants with automatic state management.

props.name: ndk
props.description: NDK instance (uses context if not provided)

props.name: target
props.description: User or hashtag string to follow/unfollow

props.name: compact
props.description: Enable compact mode with hover expansion
